Welcome to Reskit's documentation!
==================================

Reskit is researcher kit for reproducible machine learning experiments.
The project is on `GitHub <https://github.com/neuro-ml/reskit>`_.

User guide
----------

  :maxdepth: 2

  modules/installation
  modules/tutorial
  modules/api_reference
